channel.title: Home on Ayman Mohey
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Ayman Mohey

item.title: Organize,speed and customize in Bear
item.description: Flexible organization with tags # Instead of rigid folders, Bear uses tags to organize notes. Just like social media, a tag is a simple pound sign and a word, like #bear, and they can go anywhere in your notes.

item.title: Unlock the power of your apps with aesthetic interfaces
item.description: As much as I love to rename and keep my layers in Figma organized, it’s not always the easiest to do, mainly because renaming can be such a tedious task. To help, Figma has a built-in feature that allows any number of selected layers to be simultaneously renamed, and it’s a powerful utility that can dramatically speed up the naming process.
